rooms.description: The entrance hall serves as a reception area with Vastu-compliant positioning of the main door facing north-east. The living area is open-plan to facilitate natural light and ventilation.
Adjacent to the living area, the dining space features ample seating and overhead lighting arranged in a balanced way according to Vastu.

The kitchen is designed with energy-efficient layout. The sink and stove are placed ensuring a smooth workflow while adhering to Vastu guidelines by avoiding placing water elements in the north-east corner.
Located near the living area for convenience. Ventilation and natural light are prioritized.
A compact storage space that includes laundry and storage facilities.

openings.description: Entry door designed to be wide enough for comfortable access and is Vastu-compliant.
Leading to the garden, these doors are designed to maximize natural light and ventilation.

garden.description: A spacious garden with landscaping that incorporates native Mediterranean plants and a small seating area. The garden is positioned towards the south-west side for optimal balance as per Vastu principles.
